title: NEW SEASON SUCKS :(
body:
What does everyone think of where they got placed this season in ranked?
Bronze is full of trolls,akfs,rude nasty people.
How many people do you think has stopped playing?
How many of yous are ready to stop playing?
Do you think they fucked up this year?
Who wants to be replaced into where they were last season?
Do you think people need to be given another fair  to get away from all the trolls?

replies.body:
Hey dude,

Looks like you're having a rough streak (I experienced the same over the weekend went like 3 wins - 20 losses and dropped from plat 5 to gold 1)

**TL;DR** Don't focus on winning, Don't focus on others. Do focus on your own game, do focus on improving and learning from every game. If you can do that winning will come as a side effect.

* What's the main point of solo queue for you? Personally for me its all about being the best player I can be. How can I improve and climb the ladder till I am happy with my current skill level? It's all about learning. How do I die less? how do I impact the game more? how do I pressure the map? how do I control vision? how do I do everything better? The focus is on myself. It's all about doing everything in my control to impact the game positively and learning what else I can do to impact the game more. If you learn and improve from every game and find enjoyment from that then win or lose it doesn't matter as much. As long as you're improving every game! Winning will come as a side effect if you have this mindset


* One thing that has helped me the MOST in changing my mindset to purely focus on myself is to look at my own KDA ((kills+assists)/deaths) every game. Personally I have a mind set of "If I don't get X KDA then I did not impact the game enough to win (I wasn't good enough there is more to learn)"
For me right now that X is 4, if I don't get a KDA of 4 or more I heavily review why I died so much or why I didn't get assists or why I didn't get any kills. Why did I not influence the game enough?

Below is an image with your last 14 games, your kda and whether you won or not (red is a loss , green is a win).
In your last 14 games you only had one game with a KDA over 4 (and you won that one!) you had a couple over 3.5 and you won one of those.
http://i.imgur.com/CR6Isvh.png

 
Maybe go back and think about what you could have done to make more positive impact on the game (more kills + assists, less kills). I guarantee if you can work on your game and work towards 4 KDA each game you will start climbing out.

Something that really helped me get into the right mind set for ranked games was this great [gbay99 video](http://youtu.be/5MTO2a7ZFcc)

Maraudaur you seem like a nice person, at least better than me. Do you if there is any chance that I can get banned for the firewall error I am getting recently?

I am already placed in 20 mins queue :(. I stopped playing ranked too just so my teammates don't loose because of my firewall error.

I even posted my issue to the Riot Technical team, now they are talking to the ISP's that are experiencing this issue.

As you know going afk with a firewall error is not my fault. Is there any chance I can get banned after the 20 mins queue? Can the ban be lifted if the Riot technical team already know they are issue with the server and it is not my fault?

@Maraudaur

There were people in plat 3 two were placed into silver 1 after winning  7/10 games. Honestly...tell me how this "reset" was soft.
I was b1 won 7/10 and got put in b3

> [{quoted}](name=lIlIIlIIIlIIlIl,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0MNXy4ig,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-02-03T09:50:33.148+0000)
>
> @Maraudaur
> 
> There were people in plat 3 two were placed into silver 1 after winning  7/10 games. Honestly...tell me how this "reset" was soft.

That happened to my plat 4 mate, placed into silver 1 :) He's now in Gold V though.

yeah man .. sliver 1 last season then drop to bronze 5.. but hs right @marauder.. just play ur main champs and ul b out of bronze in no time .. now im in b2 within 3days after my placements .. the coolthing  abt  bronze .. they dnt cs properly .. use that to ur advantage.. peace out bro..
KDA isn't everything, this isn't COD ;D
I average over 4 KDA in my last few games, but I'm still bronze V scrub bait. :)

Hey dude,

Quickly reviewing your last few games;
http://i.imgur.com/7zXVyka.png

Looking back 12 games it looks like you had some good games. You went 4 wins and 8 losses.
Lets look at the 8 losses. You managed to get 5+ KDA in 2 of those games (great work!). That's really bad luck. BUT in the other 6 losses you didn't manage to get over 1.7 KDA. 

Maybe go back and think about what you could have done to make more positive impact on the game (more kills + assists, less kills). I guarantee if you can work on your game and work towards 5 KDA each game you will start climbing out.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0MNXy4ig,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-02-03T08:33:39.971+0000)
>
> 
> Maybe go back and think about what you could have done to make more positive impact on the game (more kills + assists, less kills). I guarantee if you can work on your game and work towards 5 KDA each game you will start climbing out.

Check now, I'm averaging over 5 KDA for past 20 games...still scrub level though :)

> [{quoted}](name=Bookbash,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0MNXy4ig,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T08:31:17.881+0000)
>
> Check now, I'm averaging over 5 KDA for past 20 games...still scrub level though :)

How about now, average of over 5 KDA for 700 games, not happening, still bronze 5 :)
Hey Maraudaur check my stats now. Still Bronze. Just proving that KDA has nothing to do with getting out of bronze :)

> [{quoted}](name=ydissac,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0MNXy4ig,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-03T00:53:46.300+0000)
>
> What does everyone think of where they got placed this season in ranked?
> Bronze is full of trolls,akfs,rude nasty people.
> How many people do you think has stopped playing?
> How many of yous are ready to stop playing?
> Do you think they %%%%ed up this year?
> Who wants to be replaced into where they were last season?
> Do you think people need to be given another fair  to get away from all the trolls?



Funny thing is, This new Season Riot very accurately nailed the bad players from the good ones. 

I am now coming across lots of elo boosted gold players stuck in Silver 5 and even bronze. While some gold players PUT IN SILVER 5 EASILY AFTER PLACEMENTS easily go back to Gold 3 or higher. The other really %%%%%%ed Gold players are clearly stuck in SILVER 5 or bronze 1's, 2's etc

I was bronze 5 last season, I had KDA of 10/10/10 most games, I tried to carry every game. I learned a lot when being stuck in bronze, I mean a lots, so much that I am better than many Gold 5's now.

This season was just too easy for me. I picked Jinx as adc, and literally carry my noob supp too many games. I just get the towers and dragons really quickly and I focus on only objectives. Since most bronzes are clearly trollers, you have to do everything yourself. 

Even if u tell a bronze to not feed then all of a sudden they start feeding more.

i watched lots of cool stream like iamcutiepie, wildturtle and learned how to vent off the anger.

I do rage many times when players are just purely %%%%%%ed. Luckily this season, all the trolls were kicked to bronze 4 or lower. I know your feeling dude, it suck to be put up with trolls or purely unskilled players who cant even have 100 cs in 30 minutes mark.

But now it is not troll I am having issue with, Riot is now putting me with bad players but not trolls, most of my players were Gold 5 or higher last season. 

But now the main problem is RIOT TROLLING ME WITH THEIR BROKEN SERVER ISSUES. I told this to them one hundred times. I will keep repeating this like mantra everyday to riot.

Here it comes again:

RIOT PLS FIX YOUR SERVERS, I AM GETTING FIREWALL PROBLEM, LOST 3 RANKED GAMES IN A ROW SINCE I WAS DISCONNECTED. I LET DOWN ALL MY TEAM MATES SINCE I could not connect to the game. SWITCHED MANY ISP's, still RITO U R TROLLING ME. NOW U TROLL BETTER THAN UR INVENTIONS "TRUNDLE AND TEEMO".  

REMOVE THE 20 MIN LEAVER BUSTER QUEUE FOR OCEANIA UNTIL YOUR SERVERS ARE FIXED AGAIN. PLEASE TEARS TEARS.

Hey Maraudaur,

Yeah was kinda talking about [my past 20 games](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=bookbash). Not that this bothers me, I know i'm better than Bronze V in some areas, and just Bronze V in others (Mechanics for one). Check out my next game, what do you think? 

[http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/77851972/201025528](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/77851972/201025528)
Hmm... Last season was in silver with silver 1 elo, this season in bronze 4 with bronze 3 elo, enjoying ranked much more this season. If I ever reach gold then I might consider quitting ranked.
